Description: Sole of a sandal for the right foot, made of leather and covered with black resin, with perforation for toe strap which is missing, stitched around edge, layer of resin added to sole.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405729001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
